workshop_chairs: Jianwen Su, University of California at Santa Barbara, CA, USA
workshops.submission_information: Workshop proposals shall be submitted to Workshop Co-chairs; see https://icsoc2025.hit.edu.cn/19950/list.htm for the list of information to include in the proposal.

details.call_for_proposals: ICSOC is inviting applicants to submit proposals for high-quality workshops contributing to the scientific program of the main conference.

submission_information: Proposals must include focused discussions on specific sub-areas within Service-Oriented Computing.
